how to query
       

SQL unified database

  • all NLP databases are converted to tabular form so that a relational database can handle the data
  • the targeted form is SQL, and specifically but not exclusively MySql and Sqlite
  • the tables are made joinable and reference each other, foreign keys are resolved
  • the end result is an interconnection of databases (NETs) which are thus unified (U) and can be queried with SQL, hence 'SqlUNet'
  • proof of concept is the Semantikos Android application

Databases

database version source role
Open English WordNet 2022 source words, senses, relations
SyntagNet 1.0 source collocations
VerbNet 3.4 source semantic roles
Propbank 3.1 source semantic roles
SemLink 2.0.0 source semantic roles
FrameNet 1.7 source semantic roles
PredicateMatrix 1.3 source semantic roles
SUMO 2022 source ontology, inference
British National Corpus statistical data 2001 source frequency

Restore

How to restore the database


Builder

The builder utilities that produce the SQL statements are available as two distinct if related projects: oewntk for the wordnet core and semantikos builder for the other xnets.
